text: Peter Ford (born 1962 in Ballinrobe, County Mayo) is an Irish former sportsperson. He played Gaelic football with Sligo club St Mary's and was a member of the senior Mayo county team in the 1980s and 1990s. Ford later served as manager of the Galway and Sligo teams. He has also managed Breaffy. He is a secondary school teacher. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Gaelic football managers Category:Irish schoolteachers Category:Mayo inter-county Gaelic footballers Category:St Mary's (Sligo) Gaelic footballers
title: Peter Ford (Gaelic footballer)
